hanzi-su-wiki:
陸

Значения

Земля, суша, материк

Мнемоника

  • Материк. На фоне воды похож на гриб и как стена 阝 преграждает ей путь.

  • "На этой земле вы можете увидеть только автобусную остановку."

Варианты

陆
purpleculture_pinyin:
lù
shore; land; continent
берег; земельные участки; континент

liù
six (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
шесть (цифра банкира о борьбе с мошенничеством)
rtega_mnemonic:
陸陸RS
陆陆		land, continental, army, an accounting form of 六
  • land with trees 坴 surrounded by slopes 阝 defended by an army; right top looks like six 六
  • ⓢ land surrounded by slopes 阝 defended with a weapon 击
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 陆)
Pictophonetic: 坴 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
陸續 [ lù xù ]: in turn; successively; one after the other; bit by bit
陸地 [ lù dì ]: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
陸軍 [ lù jūn ]: army; ground forces
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 坴 [ lù ] a clod of earth; land
heisig_chinese_memo: In the distance, there is a pinnacle, which the newly-awakened rice-seedlings who are still stuck in the ground can see. Could it be the Promised Land?
heisig_constituent: land, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, mini-tractor, rice seedlings, soil, dirt, ground, human legs, soil2, dirt2, ground2
heisig_story: The sense of land carried by this kanji is distinct from soil (Frame 161) and ground (Frame 554) in that it is meant to represent land seen from a distance, that is, land as opposed to "water." Its elements: pinnacle . . . rice seedlings . . . ground.
koohiiStory1: My rice-seedlings have become sentient and will go on a mission. I can only apologise for the next 6 frames. In the distance, there is a pinnacle, which the newly-awakened rice-seedlings who are still stuck in the ground can see. Could it be the Promised Land?
koohiiStory2: When sailors see land in the distance, they first see the pinnacles of the new land, but when they come close enough they´ll be able to make out the rice seedlings, and finally the ground!
jp_example_words:
上陸(じょうりく): landing, disembarkation
着陸(ちゃくりく): landing, alighting, touch down
内陸(ないりく): inland
大陸(たいりく): continent
陸(りく): land, shore
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A building made from a womb must be placed upon the land.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Why must it be placed upon the land? If it were put in water, it would dissolve too quickly. So, you put your womb building on the land, instead.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The land around your womb building will, unfortunately, reek (りく) though.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's made of biological materials, so of course it will reek.
Ru_AutoNotes: Для записи чисел в документах используются особые кандзи, которые сложнее спутать друг с другом.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 陵 (みささぎ、リョウ усыпальница).
Ru_trainchinese:
liù: (число) шесть (используется при заполнении документов и чеков)
lù: (сущ) земля
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hill (⻖) by the ground ahead (坴) is your land
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When it comes to land the Pinnacle beat all other cities and found the most beautiful part of the planet.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from the " Fu " from the second " Lu ", early inscriptions from the second " Fu " from " Lu ", " Lu " is a sound character, " Fu " as the hills, as the " land " of the signifier. The original meaning is Datushan, extended to land. "The Songs of Chu. Nine sighs. "Sorrow and Suffering": "The song of patrolling the barbarians over the land, and the emptiness is lonely." Wang Yi's note: "Dafu means land." It means touring the hills and plains, as well as the crooked waters, feeling empty and lonely.

After the Spring and Autumn Period, " earth " may be added as a sign. Or instead of "圥", change from two " six " to sound symbols. Xiaozhuan to simplify as "from Fu " from " Lu " from " earth ."

The meaning of the incomplete oracle bone inscriptions is unknown. Bronze writing is used as clan name and place name. Also used as a name, Zhu Gongqizhong: "Lu Zhong", "Lu Zhong" is the ancestor of the Chu people.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to indicate the land of mounds or Gaoping, "Shangbo Bamboo Book III. Zhouyi Jian 50: "Hongjian Yulu", which means that the Hongyan go to the earth mountain.

"Said Wen": "Lu, Gaopingdi. From 𨸏 from 坴, 坴 also sounds. 𨽰, Yan Wenlu."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from the " Fu " from the second " Lu ", early inscriptions from the second " Fu " from " Lu ", " Lu " is a sound character, " Fu " as the hills, as the " land " of the signifier. The original meaning is Datushan, extended to land.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「阜」從二「圥」，早期金文從二「阜」從「圥」，「圥」是聲符，「阜」象山陵，作為「陸」的意符。本義是大土山，引申為陸地。《楚辭．九嘆．憂苦》：「巡陸夷之曲衍兮，幽空虛以寂寞。」王逸注：「大阜曰陸。」意謂遊覽山丘和平原，以及彎曲的水澤，感到空虛寂寞。

　　春秋以後，或加「土」為意符。或不從「圥」而改從二「六」為聲符。至小篆簡化為從「阜」從「圥」從「土」。

　　甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳。金文用作族氏名、地名。又用作人名，朱公䤜鐘：「陸終」，「陸終」是楚人的祖先。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，表示土丘或高平之地，《上博竹書三．周易》簡50：「鴻漸于陸」，意謂鴻雁進至土山。

　　《說文》：「陸，高平地。从𨸏从坴，坴亦聲。𨽰，籒文陸。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「阜」從二「圥」，早期金文從二「阜」從「圥」，「圥」是聲符，「阜」象山陵，作為「陸」的意符。本義是大土山，引申為陸地。

Total strokes: 11; Radical: 阜
Pictophonetic: 坴 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 坴 [ lù ] a clod of earth; land

    English Definition: shore; land; continent
    Example Words:
    陸續 [ lù xù ]: in turn; successively; one after the other; bit by bit
    陸地 [ lù dì ]: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
    陸軍 [ lù jūn ]: army; ground forces
    More: 陸* | *陸 | *陸*
  • Pinyin: liù

    English Definition: six (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

甲骨文從「 阜 」從二「 圥 」，早期金文從二「 阜 」從「 圥 」，「 圥 」是聲符，「 阜 」象山陵，作為「 陸 」的意符。本義是大土山，引申為陸地。《楚辭．九嘆．憂苦》：「巡陸夷之曲衍兮，幽空虛以寂寞。」王逸注：「大阜曰陸。」意謂遊覽山丘和平原，以及彎曲的水澤，感到空虛寂寞。 春秋以後，或加「 土 」為意符。或不從「 圥 」而改從二「 六 」為聲符。至小篆簡化為從「 阜 」從「 圥 」從「 土 」。 甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳。金文用作族氏名、地名。又用作人名，朱公䤜鐘：「陸終」，「陸終」是楚人的祖先。 戰國竹簡用作本義，表示土丘或高平之地，《上博竹書三．周易》簡50：「鴻漸于陸」，意謂鴻雁進至土山。 《說文》：「陸，高平地。从𨸏从坴，坴亦聲。𨽰，籒文陸。」
Oracle from the " Fu" from the second " Lu", early inscriptions from the second " Fu" from " Lu", " Lu" is a sound character, " Fu" as the hills, as the " land" of the signifier. The original meaning is Datushan, extended to land. "The Songs of Chu. Nine sighs. "Sorrow and Suffering": "The song of patrolling the barbarians over the land, and the emptiness is lonely." Wang Yi's note: "Dafu means land." It means touring the hills and plains, as well as the crooked waters, feeling empty and lonely. After the Spring and Autumn Period, " earth" may be added as a sign. Or instead of " 圥", change from two " six" to sound symbols. Xiaozhuan to simplify as "from Fu" from " Lu" from " earth." The meaning of the incomplete oracle bone inscriptions is unknown. Bronze writing is used as clan name and place name. Also used as a name, Zhu Gongqizhong: "Lu Zhong", "Lu Zhong" is the ancestor of the Chu people. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to indicate the land of mounds or Gaoping, "Shangbo Bamboo Book III. Zhouyi Jian 50: "Hongjian Yulu", which means that the Hongyan go to the earth mountain. "Said Wen": "Lu, Gaopingdi. From 𨸏 from 坴, 坴 also sounds. 𨽰, Yan Wenlu."

陸字的基本解释

陸
lù

陸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》力竹切，入屋，來。］
“陆1”的繁体字。
(1)高平之地；陆地。
(2)大土山。
(3)道路。指陆上通道。
(4)特指楼与楼之间的复道。
(5)物体运行的轨道。
(6)草名。即商陆。
(7)跳跃。
(8)通“睦”。
(9)用同“碌”。参见“陸陸”。
(10)用同“擄”。参见“陸掠”。
(11)姓。
[②]［liù］
“陆2”的繁体字。
数目字“六”的大写。

陸字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陸； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1355第01
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【廣韻】【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】?力竹切，音六。【玉篇】厚也。【廣韻】高也。【爾雅·釋地】高平曰陸。【釋名】陸，漉也。水流漉而出也。【易·漸卦】鴻漸于陸。【詩·豳風】鴻飛遵陸。　又地名。【孟子】孟子之平陸。【註】齊下邑。　又藪名。【爾雅·釋地】晉有大陸。【左傳·定二年】魏獻子田於大陸。　又縣名。【隋書·地理志】趙郡大陸縣。　又州名。唐置。　又漢侯國，在壽光。見【史記·建元以來王子侯者年表】。　又?陸，外國名。【前漢·西域傳】?陸國王，治天山東乾當國。　又【玉篇】星也。【爾雅·釋天】北陸，虛也。西陸，昴也。【疏】陸，中也。北方之宿，虛爲中也。西方之宿，昴爲中也。【左傳·昭二年】古者日在北陸而藏冰，西陸朝覿而出之。【註】陸，道也。在北陸，謂夏十二月，日在虛危。在西陸，謂夏三月，日在昴畢。　又【玉篇】道也，無水路也。【周禮·冬官考工記】作車以行陸。【莊子·則陽篇】方且與世違，而心不屑與之俱，是陸沈者也。【註】人中隱者，譬之無水而沈也

Basic explanation of words
land
lù

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Guang Yun" Li Zhu cut, enter the house, come. ]
Traditional characters for "陆1".
(1) Gaoping land; land.
(2) Datushan.
(3) Road. Refers to the land channel.
(4) Especially refers to the double road between the building.
(5) The orbit of the object.
(6) Cursive name. That is Pokeweed.
(7) Jump.
(8) Through "mu".
(9) Use the same as "Lu". See "Lu Lu".
(10) Use the same as "capture". See "Land Plunder".
(11) Last name.
[②]［liù］
Traditional characters for "陆2".
The capitalization of the number "six".
land
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　Lu; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1355 No. 01
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] [Rhyme Meeting]? Li Zhu cut, sound six. [Jade articles] Thick also. [Guang Yun] Gao Ye. [Erya·Shidi] Gao Ping said Lu. [Release name] Lu, Luo Ye. The water flows out too. [Easy·Jian Gua] Hongjian Yu Lu. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Hongfei Zunlu.　Also place name. 【Mencius】Mencius's Pinglu. [Note] Qixiayi.　 and serval name. [Erya·Shidi] Jin has the mainland. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding 2nd Year] Wei Xianzi Tian in the mainland.　Also the county name. [Book of Sui·Geography] Zhaojun Dalu County.　Also the name of the state. Tang Zhi.　Han Hou Guo, in Shouguang. See [Historical Records · Chronology of Princes and Marquis since the Founding of Yuan Dynasty].　 Another? Lu, a foreign name. [Pre-Han · Western Regions Biography]? King Lu, ruled the Tianshan Mountain as a country.　[Jade articles] Star also. [Erya·Shitian] Beilu, Xu Ye. Westland, Subaru also. 【Sparse】Lu, Zhongye. The lodging in the north, imaginary is China. In the lodging of the West, the Pleiades are China. [Zuo Zhuan · 2nd Year of Zhao] The ancients hid the ice in the Northland, and went out in the Westland pilgrimage. [Note] Lu, Dao Ye. In Hokuriku, summer is called December, and the sun is in vain. In Xilu, it is called Xia March, and the sun is in Subaru.　[Jade Chapter] There is also a way, and there is no waterway. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] As a car to travel by land. 【Zhuangzi·Zeyang】Fang and contrary to the world, but disdainful of it, it is also Lu Chen. [Note] Those who are hidden among people, for example, sink without water

liù, lù
вм. 陆

陸

Значения

Земля, суша, материк

Мнемоника

  • Материк. На фоне воды похож на гриб и как стена 阝 преграждает ей путь.

  • "На этой земле вы можете увидеть только автобусную остановку."

Варианты

陆

Radicals: 阝, 坴  (building, womb)
Meaning Mnemonic
A building made from a womb must be placed upon the land.
Why must it be placed upon the land? If it were put in water, it would dissolve too quickly. So, you put your womb building on the land, instead.
Reading Mnemonic
The land around your womb building will, unfortunately, reek (りく) though.
It's made of biological materials, so of course it will reek.

MDBG | BKRS | WriCh | Qianyix | YBridge | Collocs | ChPop | SimCh | Stats | Google Images | Char lookup site

儿 (ножки), 土 (земля), 阡

Для записи чисел в документах используются особые кандзи, которые сложнее спутать друг с другом.

Не путать: 陵 (みささぎ、リョウ усыпальница).
